alert.note: Alert for Oconto (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:34PM CDT until June 15 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR EASTERN BROWN...KEWAUNEE...SOUTHERN MARINETTE...DOOR...SOUTHERN OCONTO AND EAST CENTRAL SHAWANO COUNTIES... At 633 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gillett to 8 miles northeast of Pulaski to near Green Bay to near Bellevue Town, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Bay Shore Park, Oconto, Luxemburg, Kewaunee, Algoma, Marinette, Sturgeon Bay, Menominee and Egg Harbor. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern and east central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
